description: This Java class configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings for a web application, allowing specified local origins to access the server's resources with appropriate headers and methods.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Provides CORS configuration for the application, enabling cross-origin requests from specified local development origins.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and returns a CorsFilter bean that applies CORS policies allowing certain localhost origins with all headers and methods.
